MT library.

Introduction

There are common tools for comfortable programming.

Compilation

The cmake is used for compilation.

Cmake_Flags

  • WITH_MYSQL. If the flag set to YES than mysql will be included to mtlib. The flag set to NO by default.

  • MYSQL_PATH. The flag specify the path of mysql's includes and the client library. Default path is /usr/local/mysql/. Includes MUST be in MYSQL_PATH/include and the library MUST be in MYSQL_PATH/lib/mysql

  • WITH_SMPP. If this flag set to YES, smpp protocol supporting will be included to mtlib. The flag set to NO by default.

  • WITHOUT_TEST. If this flag set to YES, no testers will be compiled. The flag set to NO by default.

  • INSTALL_PREFIX. Set location to install. The path /usr/local/mtlib is used by default.

  • CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE. Set build type. Set 'Release' for release build or 'Debug' for debug build.
